name: Farewell Brother
description:
Farewell Brother is an interactive fiction text adventure game where you overcome the trauma of a recent accident. The game focuses on important themes, such as making amends, overcoming PTSD, and facing your fears.

Key features include:

- Replayable narrative

- Meaningful choices

- Plot twists and surprises

- Thematic audio and visuals

Mature Content:

No

Languages:

English
